backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, fields, tasks, authorization checks, and CRUD logic for fields and tasks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two color-safety fixes with associated files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief summaries describing component behavior and recent fixes.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Comprehensive regression checklist covering build, deploy, boot flow, authentication, and CRUD tests.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting reproducible steps for testing field creation failures, mainly authentication-related.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook detailing full procedure for performing a safe production redeploy with prerequisites and validation steps.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-pro: Concise post-deploy smoke test procedure verifying critical path and essential CRUD flows.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template for recording smoke test results across critical path and CRUD functionality after production deploy.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Explains the root cause, reproduction steps, and fixes for a profile save failure triggered by missing authentication and actor-readiness guards.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining light/dark design tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads bootstrap and main scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth boot flow, profile loading, stuck-state watchdog, and routing to login, profile setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Shows a non-React fallback error UI with diagnostics if the app fails before React mounts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes global boot diagnostics, environment shims, and loads boot fallback handlers before React.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Task list view providing search, sorting, and rendering of all tasks with task cards.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: A top-level React error boundary that catches render errors, logs diagnostics, and shows a fallback UI with retry, logout, and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with name and background selection, enforcing authentication and actor readiness before submission.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a new task with 1–5 scale attributes, duration, and dependency selection for a specific field.
Dialog for editing an existing field’s name, icon, color, and background, with previews and state reset on open.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s attributes, duration, dependencies, and field assignment, with data normalization and field lookup.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: A clickable card displaying a field’s icon, stats, task count, and soft-tinted background styling from appearance utilities.
frontend/src/components/FieldDetailError: React error boundary that catches render errors in field detail views and shows a styled fallback with reset and back actions.
Displays a field’s tasks with filtering, sorting, metrics, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting fields and tasks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar providing theme toggle, user profile menu, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog warning the user before overwriting all existing data during import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing card prompting users to log in with Internet Identity and listing key features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup, allowing name entry and showing auth/initialization state.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Error screen for recoverable boot failures with diagnostics, detail toggle, copy-to-clipboard, retry, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button with tooltip for toggling ascending/descending sort direction.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders a task card with completion, edit, delete, and attribute display logic using various UI components and hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootWatchdog.ts: Provides a watchdog to detect stalled app initialization states and report timeout reasons.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, initialization, login, logout, and exposes identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, fields, tasks, and related mutations with custom error handling and actor dependencies.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Wraps the base actor with additional checks and retries to ensure stable actor initialization and error annotation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and component layer customizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: React dashboard page managing field/task views, authentication state, sorting, searching, and data import/export workflows.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to detect and normalize boot-time errors into safe, user-friendly diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Utility for downloading JavaScript data as a JSON file with BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Duration conversion helpers for minutes, hours, and days plus human-readable formatting.
Normalizes export-user-data errors into categorized, user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines icon and color presets for fields and utilities to resolve icons and colors safely.
Provides predefined field card background options and helpers to resolve CSS variables.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors into friendly messages with categorized causes.
frontend/src/utils/lucideIconMap.ts: Defines a production-safe registry of Lucide icons plus a fallback icon for dynamic lookup.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Parses and validates exported JSON, converting strings to Principals and BigInts while applying defaults for missing visual fields.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes various profile save errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/softColorTint.ts: Generates soft tint background colors with hex validation and fallbacks, supporting light/dark mode mixing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, issues, and features focused on handling invalid field colors and preventing login render crashes.
